TopicTitle: Post YOUR kerman name and quote here.

Articles.Content:
Kerbal Name: James Kerman

Quote:"Never trust sheep..."

Tanner Kerman "No matter where we go, no matter how many mountains we climb, oceans we cross, planets we land on, we can only truly feel at home, in the cradle of mother kerban, to which she gave life to us, and we must not forget our roots, for without our roots we can never go on."

my Kerbal Name: Alamo Kerman

Quote: Hey Jeb? Was I supposed to throw that switch, because if not, we have a real problem!

Ohhh, I've got another

Scott Kerman.

" have you tried SCE to AUX?"

Kerbal name: Geoffel kerman (Yes, its my favorite kerbal )

"All that's kerbal, ends kerbal"

Spiff Kerman

-"Our valiant hero; Space man Spiff Kerman on the surface of Ike, battling the strange alien menace; The Kraken!!!"

(the Kraken was actually his mom,and spiff kerman is just a kerbal boy?)

Name: Drumfred Kerman

Qoute: "Let there be boosters...... AND EXPLOSIONS!!!"

Join GSSP today!!!,if you will. http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/51702-Geotech-Space-Systems-and-Products%28hiring-staff%29
I've just started a thread for everyone to show off their best modded space stations!(go here:http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/52584-Show-Your-Best-modded-Space-Station-Here%21%21)

Dear god.. Quit this advertising bullcrap!

Dear god.. Quit this advertising bullcrap!

This is my thread,i can do what i want with it.And also,this is spam,so you are no better than me.(And i HATE swearing!!)

Issac Kerman-

"what goes up must come down...in pieces"

Name: Davin Kerman

Quote: "Jeb, are you sure that this booster setup is safe?"

"Well, at least I finally got away from my ex-girlfriend."

--Danke Kerman, after being stranded on the Mun with no ship

Kerbal name: John-stanley Kerman

Quote: "The moon is not made of cheese. So sad"

Name: Jebediah Kerman

Quote: "One small step for Kerb, one giant WHAAAAAAA!"

(from a Gilly landing)

Name: Billy-Bobford Kerman

Quote: "Always remember, if the bottom part of your rocket is pointing towards space, you will not go to space today."

(Inspired from The "Up Goer Five" xkcd)

Edited November 15, 2013 by mythbusters844
Parentheses...

Oh, so many, but my Sig still stands!

"It's at times like this that I am reminded about why I got into aerospace to begin with, the severance package" - Clint Kerman, Chief Aerospace Engineer with SKRAM

Name: Mallock Kerman

Quote: "Do you have to ground me onto the ship Jeb?"

(Planned for a mission that I haven't carried out yet.)

Name: Mitchell Kerman

Quote: Remember the Chutes!

Name: William Von Kerman

Quote: Too much lag, So little time.

Quote: "Never, EVER decouple the retro rocket before deorbiting"

Name: Wilcas Kerman, after doing that

Also, this thread is a little old...

Name: Blueshark J. Kerman

Quote: "We're Losing Orbit!!"

Name: Dyogen Kerman

Quote: "Space is so bright outside this small ship"

Name: Fire Kerman (Male)

Famous Quote: "You know, I've always been a kuy that likes fire"

Yuri Kerman

"First or worst!"

Bartner Kerman

"Bill? Why do you have kapple tree seeds with you? Don't you see we're trapped on Duna? Wait..."
